---
id: delete-all-cart-items
title: "Delete all Cart Items"
description: "A shopper can clean up their cart, deleting custom items, promotions, and so on, while the empty cart remains available. The cart id, name, description, and any account or customer associations persist. The shopper can continue to add items to the cart."
sidebar_label: "Delete all Cart Items"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: docs/api/carts/carts-checkout-orders-introduction
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete all Cart Items"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v2/carts/{cartID}/items"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



A shopper can clean up their cart, deleting custom items, promotions, and so on, while the empty cart remains available. The cart id, name, description, and any account or customer associations persist. The shopper can continue to add items to the cart.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  </div>
